T02D2955:34b-0: @34b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2955:34b-1: sems can gang dag stobs dang yon tan 'phel bar 'dod pas /
T02D2955:34b-2: lha chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pas /
T02D2955:34b-3: gnas khang yid dang mthun par sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2955:34b-4: tshogs bsags pa ci rigs par byas la /
T02D2955:34b-5: sa'i cho ga dang sta gon ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du byas la /
T02D2955:34b-6: sa stegs 'dom gang ba las chags la sogs pa
T02D2955:34b-7: legs par byas la thig btab la cho ga rdzogs
T02D2955:34b-8: par bya ste / lte ba sngon po mu khyud ser pos bskor la /
T02D2955:34b-9: padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa mu khyud padma sna tshogs pa /
T02D2955:34b-10: gru chad ljang gu / khyams dang sgo rnams su
T02D2955:34b-11: ldan pa bris la dbus su gtso bo'i mtshan ma'o
T02D2955:34b-12: // shar du tri sh'u la rtse gsum pa /
T02D2955:34b-17: lho nub tu glang po che'i mche ba /
T02D2955:34b-19: byang shar du mdung thung bri'o //
T02D2955:34b-20: sgo rnams su sgo ma'i mtshan ma legs par bris
T02D2955:34b-21: la bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dgu la
T02D2955:34b-22: lha so so'i mtshan ma btab la /
T02D2955:34b-23: mgul chings la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2955:34b-24: gu gul la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis btab la bdugs la bzhag go //
T02D2955:34b-25: grva dang ngos rnams su seng ldeng gi phur pa
T02D2955:34b-26: sor brgyad pa la dar sna tshogs kyi cod pan
T02D2955:34b-28: de nas mchod pa'i bye brag dang /
T02D2955:34b-29: lha brgyad la gtor ma brgyad la sogs pa bshams la /
T02D2955:35a-0: de nas tshogs bsag pa'i rten nam mkha' la sprul la sems bskyed pa la sogs @35a * //
T02D2955:35a-1: pa'i dge sbyor gyi yan lag rnams byas la /
T02D2955:35a-2: gtso bo la sogs pa lha so so'i bum par sbyan drangs la /
T02D2955:35a-3: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bum pa'i ngo bor gnyis
T02D2955:35a-4: su med par dmigs la gtso bo'i sngags dang phyag
T02D2955:35a-6: de nas 'khor gyi lha rnams mantra dang mu tra sa sbyan drang ba ni /
T02D2955:35a-7: g-yon pa mgo thod pa thogs ba ltar byas la /
T02D2955:35a-8: g-yas pa'i sor mo gsum 'dud pa rtse gsum pa ltar byas la /
T02D2955:35a-9: aom ru sv'a h'a zhes brjod bsam h'a de ba mdog sngo skya /
T02D2955:35a-11: g-yas tri sh'u la rtse gsum pa g-yon thod pa thogs pa /
T02D2955:35a-12: skra brdzes shed mig 'bru tshugs su lta ba /
T02D2955:35a-14: dur khrod kyi rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa bskyed do //
T02D2955:35a-15: yang lag pa g-yon pa kha'i thad kar padma ltar byas la /
T02D2955:35a-16: g-yas pa mthe bong bkan pa snying gar bzhag la /
T02D2955:35a-17: aom aom sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas tshangs pa dkar
T02D2955:35a-18: po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g-yon padma 'dzin pa
T02D2955:35a-20: skra brdzes shing mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs pa'i nga ro can bskyed do //
T02D2955:35a-21: lag pa g-yon pa 'khor lo ltar byas te /
T02D2955:35a-22: g-yas pa dbyug to 'phyar ba ltar byas nas /
T02D2955:35a-23: aom bhi sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas khyad 'jug dud ka zhal dgu mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2955:35a-24: dbu skra thor tshugs gcig tu 'khyil ba /
T02D2955:35a-25: lte ba man chod sbrul du 'khyil ba /
T02D2955:35a-26: lus kun sbyan mig gis khengs pa zhal gdangs pa /
T02D2955:35a-27: steng ma lha zhal dkar po yod pa /
T02D2955:35a-28: g-yon 'khor lo g-yas rin po che'i dbyug to 'phyar ba bskyed do //
T02D2955:35a-29: lag pa g-yas kyi mthe bong dang mdzub mo gnyis
T02D2955:35a-30: rtse sbrad la lhag ma gsum nas gang gis ma
T02D2955:35a-32: aom ai sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas brgya byin ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D2955:35a-33: g-yas rdo rje rtse gsum pa /
T02D2955:35a-35: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed do //
T02D2955:35a-36: lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong gnyis dang gung mo
T02D2955:35a-37: gnyis sbyar ba bkug la lhag ma mda' ltar byas
T02D2955:35a-38: la / aom kam sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mdog smug po /
T02D2955:35a-39: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g-yas mda' g-yon gzhu bsnams pa /
T02D2955:35b-0: rgyan thams cad kyis @35b brgyan pa bskyed do //
T02D2955:35b-1: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis glang po che'i mche ba ltar byas la /
T02D2955:35b-2: aom ga sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas tshogs kyi bdag
T02D2955:35b-3: po mdog nag po sbrul ma rungs pa rnams kyis
T02D2955:35b-5: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa glang po che'i mche ba
T02D2955:35b-6: g-yon pa glang po che'i ko ba thogs pa rab
T02D2955:35b-7: tu 'jigs pa sna glang po'i sna dang mtshungs pa
T02D2955:35b-9: lag pa gnyis rab tu brkyang ba /
T02D2955:35b-10: aom bhi sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas nag po chen po mdog nag la yan lag rags pa /
T02D2955:35b-11: skra g-yengs la so rno ba /
T02D2955:35b-12: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g-yas g-yon zhags pa thogs pa bskyed do //
T02D2955:35b-13: lag pa gnyis mdung gsor ba ltar byas la /
T02D2955:35b-14: aom ga sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas smin drug gi
T02D2955:35b-15: bu mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis kyis mdung
T02D2955:35b-17: de ltar bskyed pa la mchod pa lnga phul ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug gi las bya'o //
T02D2955:35b-18: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa ci rigs par dbul lo //
T02D2955:35b-19: lha chen po brgyad la bstod cing gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D2955:35b-20: de nas lha chen po brgyad kyi so so'i sngags
T02D2955:35b-21: so so'i bum pa la khri phrag re bzlas la
T02D2955:35b-22: ye shes sems dpa' dang 'phro 'du rdzogs par byas
T02D2955:35b-23: la / rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug ste /
T02D2955:35b-24: aom pra t'i tstshe dam ma h'a satva badzra dh'a ra a'a dzny'a p'a ya ha ha ho //
T02D2955:35b-25: gdong g-yogs te me tog dor ro //
T02D2955:35b-26: de nas gdong g-yogs bkrol la so so'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ro //
T02D2955:35b-27: de nas lha chen po brgyad la bstod bas bstod la gtor ma btang /
T02D2955:35b-28: slob ma khrus nas bton la 'jig rten pa'i lha
T02D2955:35b-29: rgyab kyis phyogs pa las 'dod pa'i don ster bar
T02D2955:35b-30: gsol ba gdab / de nas mchod pa lnga phul te /
T02D2955:35b-31: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ya hi gatstsha zhes gshegs su gsol /
T02D2955:35b-33: lha ren po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur
T02D2955:35b-34: ba legs pa'i lam ston par byed pa zhes bya
